description_jp:
次に発動するSP特技で獲得するボルテージが自身のアピールの15%増加
条件:アピールチャンス(AC)開始時 確率:50%
description_en:
Voltage gained from next SP Skill increases by 15% of own Appeal.
Condition: On Appeal Chance start, 50% chance

effect.display: Gain 15% of Appeal as extra Voltage on next SP skill
effect.formatting: Gain {effect} of Appeal as extra Voltage on next SP skill
